statements: SELECT * FROM ProteomicsData WHERE is_biomarker = TRUE;
SELECT sample_id, protein_name, spectra_intensity FROM ProteomicsData WHERE peptide_sequence LIKE '%K%';
SELECT protein_name, spectra_intensity FROM ProteomicsData ORDER BY spectra_intensity DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT sample_id FROM ProteomicsData WHERE protein_name = 'Albumin';
SELECT * FROM ProteomicsData WHERE spectra_intensity > 500 ORDER BY spectra_intensity ASC;
SELECT sample_id, protein_name, peptide_sequence FROM ProteomicsData WHERE spectra_intensity > 1000 AND is_biomarker = true ORDER BY protein_name ASC
SELECT * FROM ProteomicsData WHERE protein_name LIKE 'A%' OR protein_name LIKE 'B%' ORDER BY spectra_intensity DESC
SELECT AVG(spectra_intensity) AS average_intensity, MAX(spectra_intensity) AS max_intensity FROM ProteomicsData WHERE sample_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT sample_id, COUNT(*) AS num_proteins FROM ProteomicsData GROUP BY sample_id ORDER BY num_proteins DESC
SELECT protein_name, SUM(spectra_intensity) AS total_intensity FROM ProteomicsData GROUP BY protein_name ORDER BY total_intensity DESC
SELECT * FROM Proteins WHERE protein_name = 'Actin';
SELECT protein_name, gene_name FROM Proteins WHERE molecular_weight > 50;
SELECT protein_id, protein_name, gene_name, molecular_weight FROM Proteins WHERE gene_name = 'Hsp70';
SELECT * FROM Experiments WHERE researcher_name = 'Alice';
SELECT experiment_name, researcher_name FROM Experiments WHERE sample_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT protein_name, gene_name FROM Proteins WHERE molecular_weight > 1000 ORDER BY protein_name ASC;
SELECT protein_name, gene_name, molecular_weight FROM Proteins WHERE isoelectric_point < 7.0 ORDER BY molecular_weight DESC;
SELECT * FROM Proteins WHERE gene_name LIKE 'ABC%' OR gene_name LIKE 'DEF%';
SELECT experiment_name, researcher_name FROM Experiments WHERE researcher_name = 'John Doe' ORDER BY experiment_name ASC;
SELECT experiment_name, researcher_name FROM Experiments WHERE sample_id IN (SELECT sample_id FROM Samples WHERE researcher_name = 'Jane Smith');
SELECT * FROM Proteins;
SELECT protein_id, protein_name, protein_length FROM Proteins WHERE protein_length > 100;
SELECT protein_id, protein_name FROM Proteins WHERE molecular_weight < 50;
SELECT * FROM Samples ORDER BY sample_date DESC;
SELECT experiment_name, experiment_type FROM Experiments WHERE result_id IS NULL;
SELECT protein_name, molecular_weight FROM Proteins;
SELECT sample_name, sample_volume, sample_date FROM Samples ORDER BY sample_date DESC;
SELECT protein_name, protein_length FROM Proteins WHERE molecular_weight > 100;
SELECT experiment_name, experiment_date, sample_name FROM Experiments JOIN Samples ON Experiments.result_id = Samples.sample_id;
SELECT experiment_name, sample_name, experiment_date FROM Experiments JOIN Samples ON Experiments.result_id = Samples.sample_id WHERE sample_type = 'blood';
SELECT * FROM Protein;
SELECT protein_name, molecular_weight FROM Protein ORDER BY molecular_weight DESC;
SELECT gene_name, chromosome_id FROM Gene WHERE chromosome_id = 3;
SELECT biomarker_name, detection_method, significance_level FROM Biomarker WHERE significance_level > 2.0;
SELECT study_name, researcher_name FROM Experiment ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Protein;
SELECT protein_name, molecular_weight FROM Protein WHERE protein_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Gene ORDER BY gene_name DESC, start_position ASC;
SELECT gene_name, chromosome_id, end_position FROM Gene WHERE start_position < 1000;
SELECT experiment_id, study_name, researcher_name FROM Experiment WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Proteins;
SELECT protein_name, gene_name, molecular_weight FROM Proteins ORDER BY protein_name DESC;
SELECT peptide_sequence, location FROM Peptides WHERE location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT experiment_name, researcher_name, start_date, end_date FROM Experiments WHERE researcher_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT sample_name, date_collected FROM Samples WHERE date_collected >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Proteins WHERE molecular_weight > 5000;
SELECT protein_name, gene_name, function FROM Proteins WHERE protein_name = 'ABC' ORDER BY gene_name ASC;
SELECT peptide_id, peptide_sequence FROM Peptides WHERE location = 'cytoplasm' ORDER BY peptide_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Experiments WHERE researcher_name = 'John Doe' AND start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT sample_name, date_collected FROM Samples WHERE experiment_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
